name: Gqrx software defined radio receiver

screenshots.caption: Gqrx receiving the 40 meter / 7 MHz shortwave band with USRP
The integrated AFSK1200 decoder in action.

short_description: Gqrx is a software defined radio receiver powered by GNU Radio and the Qt GUI toolkit. It can process I/Q data from many types of input devices, including Funcube Dongle Pro/Pro+, rtl-sdr, HackRF, and Universal Software Radio Peripheral (USRP) devices.
summary: Software defined radio for Linux and Mac
